feed.title: BioDeepTime
feed.subtitle: Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.

entry.title: BioDeepTime v1.0 is on Zenodo!
entry.content:
Finally, the version 1.0 of the database is online!

doi 10.5281/zenodo.8154672


You can download the files either directly from the the Zenodo repository (above) or with our webpage!
entry.summary: Finally, the version 1.0 of the database is online!

entry.title: The BioDeepTime webpage is online!
entry.content:
Welcome to the new webpage of BioDeepTime! You can find relevant material here.

About

The about page is the basic description of the project.

Team

Everything related to people, groups and projects.

  • People: Participants of the project.
  • Workshops: The past in-person workshops.
  • Funding: Our funders.

Database

Everything related to our primary product, the BioDeepTime database.

  • Structure: The overall structure of the relational database.
  • Contributors: The databases the are represented in BioDeepTime.
  • Milestones: Version history.
  • Access: Links to acces the database.
  • Attribution: Information on the conditions of use.

Tutorials

The tutorials page features a quick introductions on how to access the basic denormalized data frame in R.

Publication

The publications page includes our official list of publications.

Contribute!

This section includes the criteria for new contributions.

Contact

This pages includes what kind of questions should be addressed to whom.
entry.summary: Welcome to the new webpage of BioDeepTime! You can find relevant material here.
